org.lsmr.vending.frontend2

Class ScriptProcessor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lsmr.vending.frontend2.ScriptProcessor

  • public class ScriptProcessor
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a simple facade class that interacts with the parser appropriately.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ScriptProcessor(java.lang.String path, IVendingMachineFactory factory, boolean debug)
      Basic constructor.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ScriptProcessor

        public ScriptProcessor(java.lang.String path,
                       IVendingMachineFactory factory,
                       boolean debug)
                throws java.io.IOException,
                       ParseException,
                       DisabledException
        Basic constructor. Constructs a parser to read the script file located at the indicated path. Registers the indicated factory with the parser. Attempts to parse and interpret the script.
        Parameters:
        path - The file path to the script file to be read.
        factory - A factory object that allows vending machines to be created.
        debug - A flag that indicates whether debugging information should be sent to the standard error stream.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the path does not exist, or if the file located there cannot be opened for whatever reason.
        ParseException - If the script file does not conform to the correct syntax.
        DisabledException - If hardware that is disabled is required to accept coins or pop cans.
